items.title: AppSource
items.content_html:
Test & Purchase

AppSource

Our app is available for download from Microsoft AppSource.

After installation, you have the option of testing our app for 30 days. We would like to point out that fees may be incurred even during the trial period. The costs incurred can be requested via E-Mail.

If you like the app and its range of functions, you can purchase licenses for a fee at any time using our order form.

To the order form

Should any questions arise in advance, please contact Support@belware.de for technical inquiries and Info@belware.de for general inquiries such as prices, procedures or similar.
